movies.title: Nine Days
movies.description: A reclusive man conducts a series of interviews with human souls for a chance to be born.

movies.title: Rampart
movies.description: Follows veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, as he struggles to take care of his family, and fights for his own survival.
